plot: Marge tries to get Homer to lose weight. But instead, he finds a support group that encourages him to embrace his largeness.

At a concert given by Bart and Lisa to perform Springfield's new anthem Homer has such trouble rising from his seat due to his weight that he injures several people. Marge sends him to a dieting club but instead he finds himself joining Wide Pride, a group that celebrates being large and which he totally embraces - until its leader has a fatal accident.—don @ minifie-1
